{{refimprove|date=December 2010}} {{Infobox sports rivalry | name = Tirana derby II | other names = | image = | caption = Derbi between [[KF Tirana|Tirana]] and [[Dinamo Tirana|Dinamo]] | city or region = [[Tirana]],
{{flag|Albania}} | first contested = 1950 | teams involved = [[KF Tirana]], [[Dinamo Tirana]] | most wins = [[KF Tirana]] (57) | most player appearances = | mostrecent = [[KF Tirana]] 1-0 [[Dinamo Tirana]] | nextmeeting = | total = 136 matches | league = [[Kategoria superiore]] | series = [[Albanian Cup]]
[[Albanian Supercup]] | regularseason = | postseason = | largestvictory = [[Dinamo Tirana]] 6-0 [[KF Tirana]] [[Dinamo Tirana]] 1-5 [[KF Tirana]] }} The '''Tirana derby II''' is the name given to any [[association football|football]] match contested between [[KF Tirana]] and [[Dinamo Tirana]] football clubs, the two most successful clubs from the city of [[Tirana]] in [[Albania]]. It is one of the longest currently running top-flight [[local derby|derby]] in Albania.[http://www.fotbal.tv/matches/2010/10/18/albania/super-league/kf-tirana/ks-dinamo-tirana/977760/head2head/ Derbys between 1990-present] ==Background== ===Championship of 1967=== In the championship of the [[1966â67 Albanian Superliga|Albanian Superliga (1966-67)]] in [[KF Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana|Partizani]] got expelled of the league. This all hapenend in the 19th week match [[KF Tirana]] - [[Partizani Tirana|Partizani]] 2:1, both teams were expelled from the tournament, forfeiting the match and the last 3 matches by 0:3. [[KF Tirana]] was leading the league at that moment with no losses and 3 points ahead of [[Dinamo Tirana|Dinamo]]. The order to kick [[KF Tirana]] out of the competition was done by the Ministry of Affairs in [[Communist Albania]]. ===Players=== During the [[Communist Albania|Communist time]] many talents of [[KF Tirana]] where forced to leave their club and go play by [[Dinamo Tirana]] and [[Partizani Tirana|Partizani]]. This was done by the [[Communist party of Albania]]. ==Win-loss totals== {|class=wikitable style="text-align:center" !Competition !Played !KF Tirana !Draw !Dinamo Tirana !KF Tirana
Goals !Dinamo Tirana
